apihelp-practicegroups-summary: Allows actions to be taken for practice groups
apihelp-practicegroups-param-pgaction: The practice groups action to invoke
apihelp-practicegroups+edit-summary: Create or edit a practice group
apihelp-practicegroups+edit-param-name_f: Full name of the practice group
apihelp-practicegroups+edit-param-name_s: Short name of the practice group
apihelp-practicegroups+edit-param-view_b: If this practice group is publicly viewable
apihelp-practicegroups+edit-param-join_b: If this practice group is publicly joinable
apihelp-practicegroups+edit-param-any_me: If any active member can add users to this practice group
apihelp-practicegroups+edit-param-join_b: If users can request to join this practice group
If users can join this practice group using an affiliated email address
apihelp-practicegroups+edit-param-affili: A comma-seperated list of affiliated domain names
apihelp-practicegroups+edituser-summary: Create or edit a practice group user
apihelp-practicegroups+edituser-param-pr: Practice group user ID (0 if creating)
apihelp-practicegroups+edituser-param-us: Username (used in place of User ID when not readily available)
apihelp-practicegroups+edituser-param-ad: If the user an administrator of the practice group
apihelp-practicegroups+edituser-param-ac: The Unix timestamp when the user became an active user of the practice group
apihelp-practicegroups+edituser-param-in: The Unix timestamp when the user was invited to join the practice group
apihelp-practicegroups+edituser-param-re: The Unix timestamp when the user requested to join the practice group
The reason the user submitted when requesting to join the practice group
apihelp-practicegroups+edituser-param-aw: The Unix timestamp when the user submitted an affiliated email for verification to join the practice group
apihelp-practicegroups+edituser-param-af: The affiliated email address submitted by the user for verification to join the practice group
apihelp-practicegroups+edituser-param-ap: The ID of the user who was responsible for making the user a member of the practice group
apihelp-practicegroups+edituser-param-di: A value used to sort the users practice groups
apihelp-practicegroups+editvalidate-summ: Validate practice group data prior to edit
apihelp-practicegroups+editvalidate-para: Full name of the practice group
Short name of the practice group
If this practice group is publicly viewable
If this practice group is publicly joinable
If any active member can add users to this practice group
If users can request to join this practice group
If users can join this practice group using an affiliated email address
A comma-seperated list of affiliated domain names
apihelp-practicegroups+resendverificatio: Resend verification email to affiliated email address
